creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: 3 poems by Fushukutei Masume, Cho_futei Mitsumori, Moritomi(or Shinfu)tei Mitsunori
markings: Swastika mark (the poets circle mark) above the title cartouche
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
text: The younger woman (tsure) in right is a courtesan known for her dance performance representing a manountain witch. The older woman (shite) in left is a real mountain witch.
title: Yamanba
